forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 56. North northwest wind 7 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 43 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 13 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 39 mph.

weather_report:
As the cool embrace of night settles over Downtown San Francisco, the air feels fresh and invigorating. The sky remains mostly clear, offering a glimpse of the shimmering stars above, with only a few faint clouds lingering in the distance. The north-northwest wind dances through the streets, occasionally gusting as it whips past, adding a briskness that both charms and chastens. At this hour, with temperatures lingering around 56 degrees, it’s wise to don a light jacket against the cool breeze, especially if your evening ventures lead towards the waterfront.

Looking ahead to tomorrow, the city promises a sunlit adventure with temperatures peaking near 69, gradually easing towards a comfortable 64 by afternoon. While the early morning might bring a hint of a marine layer, the anticipated sunshine should drive it away, leaving a bright, cheerful day in its wake. With breezy winds to accompany the warmth, consider taking a stroll along the Embarcadero or enjoying a peaceful moment in one of the city's famous parks—perfect for reading a book or sipping a coffee while basking in the golden sunlight. In this atmosphere, life seems to slow, inviting you to fully embrace the simple pleasures of a San Francisco day.
